title: panic on 'Failed to parse patch version'
body:
## Bug Report

<!-- Thanks for your bug report! Don't worry if you can't fill out all the sections. -->

### Steps to reproduce
<!-- If possible, provide a recipe for reproducing the error. A complete runnable program is good. -->

TiKV panics due to `procfs`(< 0.10.0) if the patch version of kernel is greater than 255 https://github.com/eminence/procfs/issues/136.

Upgrading `procfs` to version >= 0.10.0 can fix it.
